description: Necropolis in Pontecagnano containing fifty burials from the Orientalizing Period (725-550 BCE) and an additional six burials from the Lucanian period (4th-3rd centuries BCE).

properties.description: Point representing the approximate centerpoint of the Loc. De Santis I necropolis, after Mehren 2019.
